original_text: The Lord hath done that which he had devised; he hath fulfilled his word that he had commanded in the days of old: he hath thrown down, and hath not pitied: and he hath caused thine enemy to rejoice over thee, he hath set up the horn of thine adversaries.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이미 정하신 일을 행하시고 옛날에 명령하신 말씀을 다 이루셨음이여 긍휼히 여기지 아니하시고 무너뜨리사 원수가 너로 말미암아 즐거워하게 하며 네 대적자들의 뿔로 높이 들리게 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord hath done that which he had devised
that he had commanded in the days of old
and he hath caused thine enemy to rejoice over thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 원수로 하여금 너로 말미암아 즐겁게 하였고

sentences.original_text: he hath set up the horn of thine adversaries
